title: Annegret Kramp-Karrenbauer
summary: Annegret Kramp-Karrenbauer (German pronunciation: [ˈanəɡʁeːt ˈkʁamp ˈkaʁənˌbaʊɐ]; born 9 August 1962),[1] sometimes referred to by her initials of AKK,[2] is a German politician serving as Minister of Defence since July 2019 and former Leader of the Christian Democratic Union (CDU).
